entry.title: New release for Postiz: Change License to AGPL3
entry.content:
We are changing the license from Apache2 to AGPL3 to sustain the software better. What does it mean for you?

AGPL3 is considered to be fully open-source, like Apache 2.0. You can use it for commercial use as much as you want.

The main thing is that if you modify the code, you must open-source it. Every version before 1.25.1 is very stable, including Apache2.

Check this to see the difference: https://chatgpt.com/share/677b82c1-7c74-800a-908f-d69cc48c0d05
